categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars: The Clone Wars

nodes.text: Minions Wreck and Wares was a building in the city Mos Eisley on the planet Tatooine during the Clone Wars.
The building consisted of three rooms which included a workshop, shooting range, and garage. The workshop room functioned as the main entrance and connection to the other rooms.

The building was scheduled to appear in the unfinished episode 5.24 of the Star Wars: The Clone Wars TV series which was cancelled during the episode's production. The building was to appear in a four-episode arc starring Cad Bane and Boba Fett. The entrance and workshop part of the building was designed by Hyunwoo Lim.
